title: Investigate TOON format for LLM efficiency
description:
TOON (Token-Oriented Object Notation) is a new format designed to reduce LLM token usage by 30-60%.

## References
- https://github.com/toon-format/toon
- https://medium.com/data-science-in-your-pocket/toon-bye-bye-json-for-llms-91e4fe521b14
- https://www.tensorlake.ai/blog/toon-vs-json

## Status
Deferred to v2 - format is too new (Nov 2025), only TypeScript SDK available.

## When to revisit
- Go SDK becomes available
- Format matures with more enterprise adoption
- Security concerns addressed

title: go-split v1.0: AI-powered Go file splitter
description:
# go-split v1.0

CLI tool to intelligently split large Go files into smaller, focused modules using AI analysis.

## Goals
- Analyze Go files and recommend splits
- Generate split files with proper imports
- Run quality checks (fmt, vet, lint, security, tests)
- Support JSON/JSONL output for scripting
- Detect and handle associated test files

## Key Features
- `analyze` - Show file structure and AI recommendations
- `generate` - Create split files
- `check` - Run quality checks
- `validate` - Verify Go syntax

## Non-Goals (v1)
- TOON format support (too new, defer to v2)
- Automatic test splitting (manual for now)
